name: Dark Stylish/Stylus Interface
description: This changes the extension pages of Stylish/Stylus to have a dark theme.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)

additional_info: Added support for Chrome Stylus extension if anyone's using that instead of Stylish. For some unknown reason, this is considered "not available for Chrome" even though it mainly is for Chrome with only one Firefox URL. Copy-paste the CSS manually if you're using Google Chrome.
